01-no-ajax.body:
A world with no Ajax

  • We have to Reload pages to get Results back

Solution?

  • We want the browser to update the page without issuing a whole page reload
  • This would save time and look pretty.

03-exercise.body:
Exercise

Create a 5 second fake delay on the update action in the ArticlesController. Verify that the articles take longer to update. Create an UpdateJob that handles that delay. Enqueue the fake delay in your update action. Make sure that the delay is no longer there.
